Pamphlets, Cards and Blanks

Unionist content

Transcription

PAMPHLETS, CARDS AND BLANKS OF EVERY DESCRIPTION neatly printed at this office.

â˜ž An assortment of Blank Cards for sale.

About this Item

The Unionist was hardly a self-evident advertisement for printing services. These novice editors constantly mix fonts and sizes, and rarely produced clean copy.
